content:
Scenario: Neighborhood resource sharing reduces household costs
    Given many families have similar needs
    And resource sharing could reduce individual costs
    When the neighborhood_elohim identifies sharing opportunities

    And tool libraries and resource sharing should be facilitated
    And neighborhood coordination should stretch Marcus's budget further
    And collective consumption should reduce individual scarcity
